attributes.action: stop the Queen's Guard's regiments using real bear hides for their headpieces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The five guards units use real bear skins for their head pieces. These are often got using cruel hunting methods of the bears. These skins could easily be replaced with synthetic materials with almost the same aesthetics. The UK has led the way in tackling animal cruelty and this would make a major difference to the lives of a wonderful animal.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
